authors.name: Roger Federer
authors.quote: There’s no way around hard work. Embrace it

authors.name: Derek Jeter
authors.quote: There may be people who have more talent than you, but there’s no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do – and I believe that

authors.name: Michael Jordan
authors.quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed

authors.name: Muhammad Ali
authors.quote: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee

authors.name: Pele
authors.quote: The more difficult the victory, the greater the happiness in winning

authors.name: Bruce Lee
authors.quote: Mistakes are always forgivable if one has the courage to admit them
